			$$('.hasTip').each(function(el) {

					var parts = title.split('::', 2);
					el.store('tip:title', parts[0]);
					el.store('tip:text', parts[1]);
				}

      <div style="margin: 40px 0 0 0;"><span style="font-size: 30px; font-family: Simsun;"> 锂电 &amp; 5V/DC双电源设计。<br />便携的开发板，秀自己的风采。 </span></div>
    </div>

    </div>
    <div style="padding: 28px 500px 0 0;">
      <div style="margin: 30px 0 10px 0;font-size: 36px; font-family: Arial,SimHei; font-weight: bold;">ARM 移动开发 Step2</div>
      <div style="margin: 0 0 10px 10px; font-size: 46px; font-family: Simhei; font-weight: bold;">WIFI网络</div>
      <div style="margin: 40px 0 0 0; font-size: 28px; font-family: Simsun;">紧随时代，板载WIFI。<br />无线网络开发学习，就是这么简单。</div>
    </div>

    <div style="clear:both"></div></div>

      <div style="margin: 0 0 10px 10px;font-size: 46px; font-family: Simhei; font-weight: bold;">丰富接口</div>
      <div style="margin: 40px 0 0 0;"><span style="font-size: 28px; font-family: Simsun;"> 接口资源丰富。<br />按键摇杆双手布局设计。 </span></div>
    </div>
    <div style="clear:both"></div></div>
  <div style="margin: 20px 0 0 0;">
    <div style="width: 500px;float:right;margin: 0 0 0 0;">
      <img src="/images/jazz/coreboard_large.png" border="0" />
    </div>
    <div style="padding: 28px 500px 0 0;">
      <div style="margin: 30px 0 10px 0;font-size: 36px; font-family: Arial,SimHei; font-weight: bold;">ARM 移动开发 Step4</div>
      <div style="margin: 0 0 10px 10px;font-size: 46px; font-family: Simhei; font-weight: bold;">精致核心板</div>
      <div style="margin: 40px 0 0 0; font-size: 28px; font-family: Simsun;">最小imx233,基于ARM926E核心，尺寸仅为44mm*37mm。<br />不失稳定性，便于工业研发。</div>
    </div>

  <div align="center" style="font-size:35px;font-family:Simhei;font-weight:bold;margin:60px 0 0 0">
    Jazz规格参数表
    <div style="font-size:20px">
      (<span style="color:#ff0000">*</span> 代表不固定)
    </div>
  </div>
  <div align="center" style="margin:20px 0 60px 0">
    <table style="border-collapse: separate;" bordercolor="#d0d0d0" cellspacing="0" width="80%" aligh="center" border="1">
      <tbody>
        <tr style="font-size:20px;font-family:Kaiti,kaiti_GB2312;font-weight:bold;background-color:#d0d0d0">
          <th>
            <div align="center">名称</div>
          </th>
          <th>
            <div align="center">规格</div>
          </th>          
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td>
            <div align="center">处理器</div>
          </td>
          <td>
            <div>Freescale i.MX233处理器，ARM926EJ-S内核，主频454MHz</div>
          </td>
           
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td>
            <div align="center">内存</div>
          </td>
          <td>
            <div>标配128兆字节DDR内存</div>
          </td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td>
            <div align="center">Flash</div>
          </td>
          <td>
            <div>256M NAND Flash</div>
          </td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td>
            <div align="center">时钟</div>
          </td>
          <td>
            <div>核心板采用24MHz、32.768MHz时钟源；底板采用12MHz、40MHz时钟源</div>
          </td>
        </tr>        
        <tr>
          <td>
            <div align="center">锂电池</div>
          </td>
          <td>
            <div>标配3.7V 2200mAh锂电池，更换便捷</div>
          </td>
           
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td>
            <div align="center">DC插座</div>
          </td>
          <td>
            <div>支持5V电压供电</div>
          </td>
           
        </tr>        
        <tr>
          <td>
            <div align="center">WIFI</div>
          </td>
          <td>
            <div>使用REALTEKRTL8188CUS芯片，稳定高效</div>
          </td>
           
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td>
            <div align="center">触摸屏</div>
          </td>
          <td>
            <div>标配4.3寸触摸屏，24bit,4线触摸</div>
          </td>
           
        </tr>  
        <tr>
          <td>
            <div align="center">旋转编码器</div>
          </td>
          <td>
            <div> </div>
          </td>
           
        </tr>  
        <tr>
          <td>
            <div align="center">USB</div>
          </td>
          <td>
            <div>一个miniUSB，支持OTG功能；一个USB-A接口</div>
          </td>         
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td>
            <div align="center">SD卡槽</div>
          </td>
          <td>
            <div>一个MicroSD卡卡槽，手机内存卡也有新用处</div>
          </td>
           
        </tr>      
        <tr>
          <td>
            <div align="center">MIC</div>
          </td>
          <td>
            <div>板载MIC，录音清晰</div>
          </td>
           
        </tr>  
        <tr>
          <td>
            <div align="center">红外接收器</div>
          </td>
          <td>
            <div>一个红外接收器</div>
          </td>
           
        </tr>  
        <tr>
          <td>
            <div align="center">用户按键</div>
          </td>
          <td>
            <div>四个独立按键</div>
          </td>
           
        </tr>        
        <tr>
          <td>
            <div align="center">多功能按键</div>
          </td>
          <td>
            <div>一个多功能按键，POWERON</div>
          </td>
           
        </tr>  
        <tr>
          <td>
            <div align="center">摇杆开关</div>
          </td>
          <td>
            <div>一个摇杆开关，作为模拟按键</div>
          </td>
           
        </tr>  
        <tr>
          <td>
            <div align="center">耳机接口</div>
          </td>
          <td>
            <div>一个3.5mm耳机接口</div>
          </td>
           
        </tr>  
        <tr>
          <td>
            <div align="center">音频输入接口</div>
          </td>
          <td>
            <div>一个3.5mm音频输入接口</div>
          </td>
           
        </tr>  
        <tr>
          <td>
            <div align="center">SPDIF</div>
          </td>
          <td>
            <div>一个数字音频接口</div>
          </td>
           
        </tr>        
        <tr>
          <td>
            <div align="center">TV-OUT接口</div>
          </td>
          <td>
            <div>一个TV-OUT视频输出接口</div>
          </td>
           
        </tr>    
        <tr>
          <td>
            <div align="center">拨码开关</div>
          </td>
          <td>
            <div>系统启动模式设置开关，采用四位拨码开关</div>
          </td>
           
        </tr>                                                                                                    
      </tbody>
    </table>
  </div>
</div>											</div>
					<div id="magictabs_gauhz_3">
				<div style="margin:50px 0 0 0">
  <div align="center">
    <img src="/images/jazz/package/package.jpg" width="80%" />
  </div>
  <div style="background-color:#acd6ff;width: 690px;height:136px;border:1px solid #66b3ff;margin: 20px 0 0 88px;">
    <div style="margin:0 0 0 5px;line-height:34px;font-weight:bold">产品清单</div>   
      <table style="border-collapse:separate; width: 99%; " bordercolor="#66b3ff" cellspacing="0" aligh="center" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="1" align="center">
        <tbody style="line-height:28px">
          <tr>
            <td>
              一块已经测试好的Jazz开发板
            </td>
            <td>
              一块4.3寸真彩触摸屏
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td>
              一个锂电池
            </td>
            <td>
              一条USB线
            </td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td>
              一个5V直流电源
            </td>
            <td> 
                         
            </td>
          </tr>
        </tbody>
      </table> 
  </div>
  <div style="background-color:#acd6ff;width: 690px;height:72px;border:1px solid #66b3ff;margin: 20px 0 0 88px;">
    <div style="margin:0 0 0 5px;line-height:34px;font-weight:bold">可选配件</div> 
    <table style="border-collapse:separate; width: 99%; " bordercolor="#66b3ff" cellspacing="0" aligh="center" bgcolor="#ffffff" border="1" align="center">
        <tbody style="line-height:28px">
          <tr>
            <td>
              Jazz调试板
            </td>
            <td>
              多功能仿真机
            </td>
          </tr>
        </tbody>
      </table>
  </div>
  <div style="margin:20px 0 0 0" align="center">
    <div style="font-weight:bold;font-size:28px;font-family:Microsoft YaHei,Simhei;margin: 0 548px 0 0;">
      Jazz调试板
    </div>
    <img src="/images/jazz/package/debugboard.jpg" width="80%" />
  </div>
  <div style="font-size:20px;font-family:Microsoft YaHei,Simhei;margin: 10px 85px 0 85px;">
    <p>Jazz调试板板载百兆以太网接口、RS232串口以及JTAG接口。用于底层开发更为高效，推荐使用！</p>
  </div> 
  <div style="margin:20px 0 0 0" align="center">
    <div style="font-weight:bold;font-size:28px;font-family:Microsoft YaHei,Simhei;margin: 0 520px 0 0;">
      多功能仿真机
    </div>
    <img src="/images/jazz/package/iceboard.jpg" width="80%" />
  </div>
  <div style="font-size:20px;font-family:Microsoft YaHei,Simhei;margin: 10px 85px 0 85px;">
    <p>我们推荐嵌入式DIY爱好者设计的ICEμ仿真机，设有JTAG、串口以及MiniUSB。稳定性好，性价比高。</p>
  </div>   
</div>											</div>
					<div id="magictabs_gauhz_4">

											</div>
					<div id="magictabs_gauhz_5">
				<div>
<div style="background-color: #acd6ff; width: 730px; height: 223px; border: 1px solid #66b3ff; margin: 20px 0 0 67px;">
<div style="background-color: #ffffff; border: 1px solid #66b3ff; margin: 2px 2px 0 2px;">
<div style="font-size: 32px; font-family: Microsoft YaHei,Simhei,Arial; font-weight: bold; float: left; margin: 32px 10px 10px 31px;">资料下载请参考EMSYM下属网站</div>
  <div style="margin: 0 20px 0 534px;"><a href="http://wiki.emsym.com/wiki/Jazz"><img src="/images/jazz/wiki_logo.png" border="0" /></a></div>
<div style="font-size: 20px; font-family: Microsoft YaHei,Simhei; margin: 10px 10px 0 10px;">
  <p><a href="http://wiki.emsym.com/wiki/Jazz"><span style="color:#003d79">嵌入式大讲堂</span></a>是内容开放的嵌入式系统学习网站。目前包含一系列嵌入式基础课程、以及处理器和开发板的使用文档。它基于维基百科平台，任何人都能够编辑它的内容。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="background-color: #acd6ff; width: 730px; height: 199px; border: 1px solid #66b3ff; margin: 20px 0 0 67px;">
<div style="background-color: #ffffff; border: 1px solid #66b3ff; margin: 2px 2px 0 2px;">
<div style="font-size: 32px; font-family: Microsoft YaHei,Simhei,Arial; font-weight: bold; float: left; margin: 32px 10px 10px 31px;">技术讨论请前往EMSYM合作社区</div>
<div style="margin: 20px 0 0 529px;"><a href="http://www.embedded-diy.com"><img src="/images/jazz/bbs_logo.png" border="0" width="160px" /></a></div>
<div style="font-size: 20px; font-family: Microsoft YaHei,Simhei; margin: 10px 10px 0 10px;">
  <p><a href="http://www.embedded-diy.com/forum.php?mod=forumdisplay&amp;fid=24&amp;filter=typeid&amp;typeid=28"><span style="color:#003d79">嵌入式DIY爱好者</span></a>社区是嵌入式工程师技术分享、生活畅谈之处。开设有“组团DIY”、“电子技术交流”、“嵌入式操作系统”等专区，常有嵌入式达人出没其中。</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>											</div>
			</div>
</div>
 	
	</div>
